statements: SELECT * FROM employee_management;
SELECT employee_name, wage FROM employee_management;
SELECT * FROM employee_management WHERE wage > 50000;
SELECT employee_id, performance_evaluation FROM employee_management;
SELECT employee_name, wage, employee_schedule FROM employee_management WHERE performance_evaluation = 'Excellent';
SELECT employee_name, wage FROM employee_management WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM employee_management WHERE wage > 5000;
SELECT employee_name, employee_schedule, wage FROM employee_management WHERE performance_evaluation = 'Excellent' ORDER BY wage DESC;
SELECT employee_name, AVG(wage) AS average_wage FROM employee_management GROUP BY employee_name;
SELECT * FROM employee_management WHERE wage BETWEEN 3000 AND 6000 ORDER BY employee_name ASC, wage DESC;
SELECT * FROM employee_schedules;
SELECT employee_id, schedule_date FROM employee_schedules WHERE employee_id = 100;
SELECT start_time, end_time FROM employee_schedules WHERE schedule_date = '2023-07-10';
SELECT * FROM employee_performance ORDER BY evaluation_date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, performance_rating FROM employee_performance WHERE performance_rating > 4.5;
SELECT * FROM employee_schedules WHERE employee_id = 1 ORDER BY schedule_date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, start_time, end_time FROM employee_schedules WHERE schedule_date >= '2023-01-01' AND schedule_date <= '2023-12-31' ORDER BY end_time, start_time DESC;
SELECT employee_id, AVG(performance_rating) AS average_rating FROM employee_performance GROUP BY employee_id HAVING AVG(performance_rating) > 3.5;
SELECT employee_id, wage, evaluation_date FROM employee_performance WHERE wage >= 15.00 ORDER BY evaluation_date ASC;
SELECT employee_id, COUNT(*) AS total_schedules FROM employee_schedules GROUP BY employee_id HAVING COUNT(*) >= 5 ORDER BY total_schedules DESC;
SELECT * FROM employee_schedule;
SELECT employee_id, shift_start_time, shift_end_time FROM employee_schedule WHERE date = '2022-09-15';
SELECT employee_id, hourly_rate, pay_frequency FROM employee_wages ORDER BY hourly_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM employee_performance WHERE evaluation_score > 80;
SELECT employee_id, MAX(evaluation_score) FROM employee_performance GROUP BY employee_id;
SELECT * FROM employee_schedule ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, shift_start_time, shift_end_time FROM employee_schedule WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY shift_start_time ASC;
SELECT employee_id, hourly_rate, pay_frequency FROM employee_wages WHERE hourly_rate > 15 ORDER BY hourly_rate DESC;
SELECT employee_id, evaluation_date, evaluation_score FROM employee_performance WHERE evaluation_score >= 80 ORDER BY evaluation_date ASC;
SELECT employee_id, evaluation_date, comments FROM employee_performance WHERE comments IS NOT NULL ORDER BY employee_id ASC, evaluation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT name, position FROM employees ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, name, position FROM employees WHERE employee_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM schedules WHERE shift_start BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT employee_id, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM performance_evaluations GROUP BY employee_id;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE position = 'Manager';
SELECT name, position FROM employees WHERE hire_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT e.name, s.shift_start, s.shift_end FROM employees e JOIN schedules s ON e.employee_id = s.employee_id;
SELECT e.name, w.wage, w.effective_date FROM employees e JOIN wages w ON e.employee_id = w.employee_id WHERE w.effective_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT e.name, pe.evaluation_date, pe.rating FROM employees e JOIN performance_evaluations pe ON e.employee_id = pe.employee_id WHERE pe.rating > 3 ORDER BY pe.evaluation_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM employee_schedules;
SELECT employee_id, date, shift_start_time FROM employee_schedules ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, full_name FROM employee_hr_details WHERE hire_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT employee_id, performance_rating, feedback FROM employee_performance WHERE performance_rating > 3;
SELECT shift_date, shift_type, employees_needed FROM staffing_levels WHERE shift_type = 'Morning' ORDER BY shift_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM employee_schedules
SELECT full_name, shift_start_time, shift_end_time FROM employee_schedules JOIN employee_hr_details ON employee_schedules.employee_id = employee_hr_details.employee_id
SELECT AVG(hourly_rate) AS avg_hourly_rate, MIN(hourly_rate) AS min_hourly_rate, MAX(hourly_rate) AS max_hourly_rate FROM employee_wages
SELECT * FROM employee_performance WHERE performance_rating >= 4 ORDER BY performance_rating DESC
SELECT shift_date, COUNT(employee_id) AS num_employees FROM staffing_levels GROUP BY shift_date ORDER BY num_employees DESC
